nodes.text: The Ragnook system was located in the Bothan sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. It shared its name with the Ragnook Mountains of the planet Kothlis as well as the beverage known as Ragnook Spring Water, which was served in the Jaded Jawa bar on that world.
The Ragnook system was established in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square R-14.
